ValidationRule.description: Account Manager cannot change the Loa Status manually to approved and rejected.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c ,"Offer in Progress"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.StageName ,"Create Offer (Bid)") ), OR( ISPICKVAL(LOA_Status__c,"Approved"), ISPICKVAL(LOA_Status__c,"Rejected") ), OR(RecordTypeId = $Label.DS_QuoteEditRecordTypeId,RecordTypeId = $Label.DS_QuoteReadRecordTypeId))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You don't have permission to select Approved/Rejected
